meta.title: We Code for Good
meta.description: We are an international IT company that specializes in front-end web development service and dreams of the stars.

express.title: Express Front‑end
express.subtitle: Fixed-cost service for fast web projects

mvp.title: MVP Development
mvp.subtitle: Only essential functionality to test business ideas

feature1.text: It is attention to detail and well-established processes that makes the difference between average and successful projects.

feature2.text: There is no perfect framework or library. Depending on the type of task, we choose the most appropriate tool. We keep a close eye on emerging web development trends, but do not forget about best practices

imageAlt.hero: Happy astronauts in front of CSSSR logo
imageAlt.figures: Square, Triangle and Circle figures in a pile
imageAlt.ourFeatures: А man who neatly and meticulously cuts geometric bonsai, showing our desire to do everything perfectly
